hadiths.text: Maimunah, the wife of the Prophet said:"I heard the Messenger of Allah say: 'One prayer in this Masjid of mine is better than a thousand prayers in any other Masjid except Al-Masjid Al-Haram

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي الْمَسْجِدِ الْحَرَامِ
chapter.eng-name: The Virtue Of Salah In Al-Masjid Al-Haram
